net.sourceforge.jnipp.peerGen
Class PeerGenerator

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.jnipp.peerGen.PeerGenerator
public class PeerGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

Entry point for invoking the Peer Generator. This class serves as the entry point to invoke the Peer Generator and is called from the main package and from the GUI. It coordinates all of the activities required to generate native C++ peer and Java proxy classes that can be used to simplify the creation and use of native code libraries.

Version:
$Revision: 1.15 $
Author:
$Author: ptrewhella $

peerHeaderGenerator

private static CPPPeerHeaderGenerator peerHeaderGenerator
Peer header file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPPeerHeaderGenerator instance utilized to generate the declaration file for the C++ peer class.

peerImplGenerator

private static CPPPeerImplGenerator peerImplGenerator
Peer implementation file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPPeerImplGenerator instance utilized to generate the implementation file for the C++ peer class.

mappingCodeHeaderGenerator

private static JNIMappingCodeHeaderGenerator mappingCodeHeaderGenerator
Mapping header file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPMappingCodeHeaderGenerator instance utilized to generate the header file for the procedural mapping code.

mappingCodeImplGenerator

private static JNIMappingCodeImplGenerator mappingCodeImplGenerator
Mapping implementation file generator. This variable contains a reference to the CPPMappingCodeImplGenerator instance utilized to generate the implemenation file for the procedural mapping code.

javaProxyGenerator

private static JavaProxyGenerator javaProxyGenerator
Java proxy class file generator. This variable contains a reference to the JavaProxyGenerator instance utilized to generate the Java proxy class file that will be utilized to access the native code from Java.

Method Detail

generate

public static java.util.Collection generate(PeerGenSettings peerGenSettings)
                                     throws java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                                            java.io.IOException,
                                            ProjectFormatException
Public entry point. This method is invoked to generate the C++ peer header and implementation files, the requisite mapping code and a Java proxy class for the Java class specified in the supplied settings.
Parameters:
peerGenSettings - The settings used to control the code generation.
Returns:
Collection of all DependencyData instances that were processed.
Throws:
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException -  
java.io.IOException -  
See Also:
DependencyData, Project
